description: Laboratory and scientific equipment needed for the workplace for no set duration.
full_summary: ### Government Tender Announcement #### Project Information PR3616 39903-23016 Laboratory Equipment: Lyophilizer #### Project Reference Information Reference Number: WS3636322776-Doc3723489209 Solicitation Number: WS3636322776 Publication Date: October 25, 2022 Closing Date: November 1, 2022, at 14:00 EST #### Project Objective The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a Lyophilizer laboratory equipment. #### Tender Details * **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired) * Category: Laboratoire and scientific equipment (Équipements scientifiques et de laboratoire) * Procurement Category: Government Department (GD) * Procurement Method: **Competitive - Open Bidding** (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner) * The project focuses on the supply of laboratory equipment; and selection criteria is. #### Project Timeline * Expected Contract Start Date: October 14, 2022 * Expected Contract End Date: March 23, 2024 #### Contracting Entity Information The Procuring Entity for this contract is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). #### Contact Information For further information, please contact Van Den Hanenberg, Stephen, at stephenvandenhanenberg@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca --- I will be glad to answer questions if there is any, about this rewritten entry. **Editing Feedback** If you found any information not easily interpretable, what can I do differently next time to help improve the quality of the entry by the time of editing stage?
